name: nasa-apod-bot
description: A NASA APOD (Astronomy Picture of the Day) discord bot

scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: atualizar o CHANGELOG.md' && npm version major -m "docs: atualizar para %s" && git push --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: atualizar o CHANGELOG.md' && npm version minor -m "docs: atualizar para %s" && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'chore: atualizar o CHANGELOG.md' && npm version patch -m "docs: atualizar para %s" && git push --tags
